channel.title: Need help with running / compling my sever!
channel.description:
Please someone help me with my sever when i try to run it says :[b]'sever' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. 'C:Program' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/b]
And when i try to complie it says:[b] Errors: You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. The system cannot find the path specified. Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . .
[/b]
When i edit the run this is whats inside it says:[b]@echo off sever Runner C:Program FilesJavajdk1.6.0_13binjava.exe java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause [/b]
When i edit the complier this is what it says: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause :confused: plz help [b][u]MSN:onlypool12@yahoo.com[/u][/b]

item.title: Need help with running / compling my sever!
item.dc:creator: @vanspunk999 vanspunk999
item.source: Need help with running / compling my sever!

item.title: Need help with running / compling my sever!
item.dc:creator: @Thecheeseman11 Thecheeseman11
item.description:
@Thecheeseman11 wrote:

  1. Its because you don’t have JRE 6 update 13. heres the link for that:
    http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index_jdk5.jsp

  2. Use this code for your compiler:

@echo off :menu title RuneXC Compiler echo Errors: if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit

and this for your run:

@echo off title Source 474 java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit

Should work after you’ve done those 3 steps.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with running / compling my sever!

item.title: Need help with running / compling my sever!
item.dc:creator: @H20Effect H20Effect
item.description:
@H20Effect wrote:

try using this code:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
